sqlset.name: ARCHITECTURE_WEB
sqlset.sql-query: SELECT EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS
SELECT T1.EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ?
SELECT T1.EXTERNAL_ID FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND T2.OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT EXTERNAL_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE EXTERNAL_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_IMAGE_STREAMS ( EXTERNAL_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE EXTERNAL_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT count (EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS
SELECT count (T1.EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ?
SELECT count (T1.EXTERNAL_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE_STREAMS T1 , V2_IMAGE T2 WHERE T1.IMAGE_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID AND T2.OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND T2.OBJECT_ID = 1?
SELECT CONTENT_ID FROM V2_CONTENT WHERE CREATOR = ?
SELECT CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, SUBJECT, SUMMARY, BODY, CREATOR, LASTMODIFIER, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_CONTENT WHERE CONTENT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_CONTENT ( CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, SUBJECT, SUMMARY, BODY, CREATOR, LASTMODIFIER, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE V2_CONTENT SET CONTENT_TYPE = ?, SUBJECT = ?, SUMMARY = ?, BODY = ?, LASTMODIFIER = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE CONTENT_ID = ?
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, BODY, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_ANNOUNCE SET SUBJECT = ?, BODY = ?, START_DATE = ?, END_DATE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_ANNOUNCE ( ANNOUNCE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, BODY, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,0,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE ANNOUNCE_ID = ?
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE USER_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT ANNOUNCE_ID FROM V2_ANNOUNCE order by MODIFIED_DATE desc
SELECT MENU_ID, NAME, TITLE, LOCATION, MENU_ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_MENU WHERE NAME LIKE ?
SELECT MENU_ID, NAME, TITLE, LOCATION, MENU_ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = ?
SELECT MENU_ID FROM V2_MENU
UPDATE V2_MENU SET NAME = ?, TITLE = ?, LOCATION = ?, MENU_ENABLED = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE MENU_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_MENU ( MENU_ID, NAME, TITLE, LOCATION, MENU_ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
DELETE FROM V2_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_MENU_XML WHERE MENU_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_MENU_XML ( MENU_ID, MENU_DATA )VALUES(?, ?)
SELECT MENU_DATA FROM V2_MENU_XML WHERE MENU_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) FROM V2_MENU
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_ATTACHMENT_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 첨부파일 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA FROM V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE V2_ATTACHMENT SET OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, CONTENT_TYPE = ?, FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_SIZE = ?, CREATION_DATE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID FROM V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA
INSERT INTO V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA (ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
UPDATE V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA SET ATTACHMENT_DATA = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
INSERT V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA (ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT ATTACHMENT_DATA FROM V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_ATTACHMENT_DATA
SELECT COUNT(ATTACHMENT_ID) FROM V2_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED FROM V2_IMAGE_LINK WHERE LINK_ID = ?
SELECT LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED FROM V2_IMAGE_LINK WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_IMAGE_LINK ( LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,? )
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_LINK WHERE LINK_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_LINK WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_IMAGE ( IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE V2_IMAGE SET IMAGE_ID = ?, OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_SIZE = ?, CONTENT_TYPE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_IMAGE_DATA (IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
UPDATE V2_IMAGE_DATA SET IMAGE_DATA = ? WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT V2_IMAGE_DATA (IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT IMAGE_DATA FROM V2_IMAGE_DATA WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_IMAGE_DATA WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_IMAGE_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 이미지 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_IMAGE_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 이미지 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT IMAGE_ID FROM V2_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc

sql-query.name: COUNT_IMAGE_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 해당 이미지 수 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT COUNT(IMAGE_ID) FROM V2_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT ACCOUNT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, SOCIAL_PROVIDER, ACCESS_TOKEN, ACCESS_SECRET, USERNAME, SIGNED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?

INSERT INTO V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, SOCIAL_PROVIDER, ACCESS_TOKEN, ACCESS_SECRET, USERNAME, SIGNED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
DELETE FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?
UPDATE V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT SET ACCESS_TOKEN = ?, ACCESS_SECRET = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 SOCIAL_ACCOUNT 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_USERNAME
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE, USERNAME 값으로 SOCIAL_ACCOUNT 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM V2_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND USERNAME = ?
SELECT OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_TYPE, TITLE, LOCATION, CREATOR, LASTMODIFIER, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM V2_TEMPLATE WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_TEMPLATE_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 TEMPLATE 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT TEMPLATE_ID FROM V2_TEMPLATE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO V2_TEMPLATE ( OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_TYPE, TITLE, LOCATION, CREATOR, LASTMODIFIER, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
UPDATE V2_TEMPLATE SET OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, TEMPLATE_TYPE = ?, TITLE = ?, LOCATION = ?, LASTMODIFIER, MODIFIED_DATE WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_TEMPLATE WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = ?
INSERT V2_TEMPLATE_BODY (BODY_TEMPLATE_ID, BODY) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT BODY FROM V2_TEMPLATE_BODY WHERE BODY_TEMPLATE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM V2_TEMPLATE_BODY WHERE BODY_TEMPLATE_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(OBJECT_ID) FROM V2_TEMPLATE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
